name: 力學（一）
description: 本課程提供物理系大學部理論力學一般的題材。
goals: 培養學生物理的歸納及推演能力
訓練學生解析的計算能力
令學生了解力學的發展歷史
使學生注意最新的發展
syllabus:
We will follow closely the topics outlined in " Classical Dynamics of Particles and Systems "  by Marion and Thornton.

Specifically, the topics covered for each week is as follows (Based on the progress and the requests from the students, these topics may be subject to modification).

Weeks 1,2,3,4: Matrix, Vector Calculus and Ordinary Differential Equation.

Weeks 4,5: Newtonian Mechanics: Newton's laws of motion of a single particle. 

Week 6: Work, Energy, and Momentum of a single particle. Simple Harmonic oscillations.

Week 7: First midterm exam.

Week 8: Simple Harmonics Oscillator (cont).

Week 9: Pendulum and Brief on Nonlinear Dynamics and Chaos..

Week 10: Gravitation.

Weeks 11, 12: Calculus of Variations.

Week 13: Second midterm.

Weeks 14, 15, 16: Hamilton's principle: Lagrangian and Hamiltonian dynamics. 

Weeks 16, 17: Coupled Oscillations.

Weeks 18: Final exam.

grading.note: Two midterm exams (Both are open book in class exams). Each counts 30 percent toward the semester grade.
One final exams (open book in class exam)
